careerTransition.description: Self-directed learning transition from automotive embedded C to web development
careerTransition.focus: React.js and Node.js training projects and tutorials

specialties: Embedded systems to web development expertise

responses.technologies: I work with modern web technologies including React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Firebase, and specialized tools like Braze, Contentful, and Datadog. I also have embedded C background from my automotive experience.
responses.experience: I have 8+ years of software development experience, including 4+ years in web development and 4+ years in embedded automotive systems. I've successfully transitioned from embedded C to modern web development and previously served as CTO of an educational platform.
responses.projects: I'm currently working on subscription features for a 1M+ user food delivery platform, nutrichefdelivery.ro, and legalmanagement.ro. Previously, as CTO/Co-Founder of nugget.courses (ended December 2023), I rebuilt the entire platform from WordPress to Next.js + Firebase.
responses.skills: My skills span frontend development (React, Next.js), project management, team leadership, and I have unique experience transitioning from embedded systems to web development. I have CTO experience handling full product development and team coordination, plus leadership experience managing up to 6 developers on embedded projects.
responses.current: I'm currently a Senior Frontend Engineer working on subscriptions and consumer messaging for a major US food delivery platform with over 1 million users.
responses.entrepreneurial: I'm an entrepreneur with multiple projects: Previously CTO/Co-Founder of nugget.courses (educational platform, ended December 2023), and currently working on legalmanagement.ro (CTO & Co-Founder) and nutrichefdelivery.ro (Full-stack Developer & Business Partner, started December 2024).
responses.cto: I was CTO/Co-Founder of nugget.courses from February 2023 to December 2023 - this role has ended. I took over a WordPress MVP and rebuilt the entire platform from scratch using Next.js and Firebase. I was involved in every part of the product and coordinated development teams. I'm currently CTO/Co-Founder of legalmanagement.ro.
responses.nugget: nugget.courses was an educational platform where I served as CTO/Co-Founder from February 2023 to December 2023. I rebuilt the entire platform from a WordPress MVP to a modern Next.js + Firebase architecture.
responses.react: I have 4+ years of React.js experience, starting from my career transition in 2021. I've worked with React.js at Fortech (3 years), Real DREAMVILLE (freelance), and currently at the USA Food Delivery Platform. I'm also experienced with the React ecosystem including Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, and modern testing libraries like React Testing Library.
responses.frontend: I have 4+ years of frontend development experience specializing in React.js and Next.js. I've built features for 1M+ user platforms, worked on subscription systems, consumer messaging, and rebuilt entire platforms from scratch. My frontend skills include React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Redux, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript.
